thread.section_title: DID Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DID | www.did.ie
thread.title: HUGH

author: HUGH
title: HUGH
text: Had a couple of minutes to look around first, then a staff member approached, listened to what we were looking for (a new vacuum cleaner), with the details we gave he showed us some options, sold one to my wife when he said it could also do cars (but it WASN'T the sort we were initially looking at). We're very happy with the new vacuum cleaner and will certainly be going to DID again just as we have for many years now.
